resources.string: Show us some likes by tapping the \'LIKE\' Button.
TwittaSave helps you to download Videos and animated Gifs from Tweets to your device.

Copy the tweet url of the tweet containing the video or animated gif. Then paste it into the tweet url box. Enter the name you want it stored with (optional). Then tap the \'Download\' button. Enjoy!!!

Select \'Share Tweet via...\' option from the (specific) tweet options. Then select TwittaSave app from the list of apps (The tweet url is automatically inserted into the tweet url box). Enter the name you want it stored with (optional). Then tap the \'Download\' button. Enjoy!!!
